title: Four time limited special offers
content: Greater Albion Typefounders has just publiseddetail of four special ofers on some of io morercent releasers. You can read about them on our [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203001343/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/).
author: Rasendyll

comments.content:
``<cite>Greater Albion Typefounders has just publiseddetail of four special ofers on some of io morercent releasers. You can read about them on our blog.</cite>''

For a limited time only, proceeds from font sales will go towards a spell-check program for the staff of GATF!
Actually, what we need to spend the proceeds on is a new set of batteries for those !@\* wireless keyboards that 'management' made us have! We can spell, honestly! :-)

We have an old Mac laptop with most of the letters worn off the keys.  
If you don't do it by touch, typing can be quite a creative experience.
